title: 20% Down-Payment | Best Location | Q3 2025 | 50/50 Payment Plan
description:
Segrex Homes are designed to inspire. Our vision is to create living spaces that add value and contentment every day, supporting individuals as they journey towards their dreams and aspirations. Strategically built in thoughtfully selected locations, our properties ensure superb long-term returns on investment. From design to delivery, our dedicated team curates every aspect of construction, upholding our promise and commitment to our long-term responsibility to our customers. We believe in creating spaces that enable people to live better lives, which is why we craft homes with meticulous attention to every last detail.  


Prime Location in JVC:
Stonehenge Residences offers a prime location in JVC, ensuring easy access to key destinations like Mall of the Emirates and Dubai Marina. Enjoy nearby retail outlets, dining options, and top educational institutions, making it ideal for families and professionals alike.

title: LAST 2 UNITS 1 BHK ✅ NEAR DUBAI ✅ SEA VIEW
description: RA-Discover the Faradis Tower at Sharjah, an exclusive 50-storey development by Tiger Properties in the bustling Al Mamzar with premium class 1, 2, 3 & 4-bedroom apartments. With its sleek design and premium features, this architectural masterpiece stands tall as a beacon of sophistication in Dubai's skyline. Each apartment within the tower is meticulously crafted to offer residents a harmonious blend of comfort, elegance, and modern convenience.

title: Pay cash and get 30% discount / Burj Khalifa view, Dubai Canal View
description:
Tiger Sky Tower at Business Bay by Tiger Properties stands as an iconic addition to the illustrious Dubai skyline, presenting premium branded 1 to 4-bedroom apartments, penthouses and a royal sky penthouse. This shining golden 122-storey high-rise marvel, soon to grace the cityscapes, embodies a fusion of modern architectural brilliance and Emirati cultural heritage. Boasting clean lines and soaring heights, this newly launched tall tower promises to redefine luxury living in the heart of Dubai.  

Key Highlights:-

Offering a diverse range of 1 to 4-bedroom apartments, 18 exclusive penthouses, and a royal sky penthouse, all meticulously designed for unparalleled living experience.  
Soaring to an impressive 532 meters with 122 floors, stands as the tallest residential building in the world, featuring an iconic design.  
The tower offers customizable penthouses in Arabic, Chinese, Greek, and French styles, 
allowing residents to personalize their homes to reflect their unique lifestyles.  
At 447 meters, the tower boasts the highest rainforest, offering residents a unique and serene escape amidst lush greenery and natural beauty.  
The tower includes the highest restaurant at 439 meters and the highest infinity pool at 431 meters, providing with unmatched dining experiences and breathtaking views.  

Key Facilities:

State of the art Gym
Swimming Pool
Concierge Services
Clubhouse
Home Cinema
Sports and Entertainment
Kids Play Areas
Fitness Zones
Gymnasium
